npcCharacters.Dialogue: Welcome to the Backwards Circuit, Racer!                     Press 'S' to Accelerate.                                                     'W' is to reverse and 'A' and 'D' to turn
Good Luck Twerp!                                                                                 You're gonna have to be pretty fast to beat the Gary
Why are you talking in third person?

Don't mind him, you'll put him in place in due time, but first we have to get you warmed up!                               Pass through all the checkpoints on the path , and it would be in your best interest not to fall off as well
